<template>
   <input type="text" id="header" v-model="title" placeholder="请输入你的任务名称，按回车确认">
</template>

<script>


 export default{
    name:'Top',
    data() {
      return {
         title:''
      }
    },
 }
</script>

<style>
   #header{
      width: 500px;
      height: 50px;
      font-size: 20px;
      
   }
</style>
